column4: Why doesn't the link to inform that I added to the menu work? The link goes to /usr/bin/inform and I installed Inform via Synaptic
what do you get for 'which inform'
/usr/bin/inform
well, try 'inform'
http://paste.uni.cc/8754
I think you don't want a link - you need to create a launcher, with the command something like, gnome-terminal /usr/bin/inform'
Still nothing
From when I used it in Windows, the "inform" command compiled the code
this is a text based app, yes?
Yes
The pastebin was from typing inform
ubotu is a bot, btw - it's not a very good conversationalist, despite appearances
Yes ;)
tbh, you'd do best to just clean install from here
How do I do that?
download the feisty cd - insert & install
I don't understand - I can't download a CD?
you can't boot off the dapper cd?
still doesn't help unless you've 2 cds
I don't have a Dapper CD
well beg/borrow/steal a feisty cd is still your easiest option
